authors.author: Chester G. Allen Fanny Jane Crosby

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Praise Him! Praise Him! newline Tell of His excellent greatness, newline Praise Him! Praise Him! newline Ever in joyful song.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Praise Him! Praise Him! newline Jesus our blessed Redeemer! newline Sing, O earth, newline His wonderful love proclaim, newline Hail Him! Hail Him! newline Highest archangels in glory, newline Strength and honor newline Give to His holy name. newline Like a shepherd newline Jesus will guard His children, newline In His arms He carries them newline All day long.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Praise Him! Praise Him! newline Jesus our blessed Redeemer! newline For our sins He suffered newline And bled and died, newline He, our Rock, newline Our hope of eternal salvation, newline Hail Him! Hail Him! newline Jesus the Crucified. newline Sound His praises, newline Jesus who bore our sorrows, newline Love unbounded, newline Wonderful, deep and strong.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Praise Him! Praise Him! newline Jesus our blessed Redeemer. newline Heavenly portals, newline Loud with hosannas ring, newline Jesus, Savior, newline Reigneth forever and ever, newline Crown Him! Crown Him! newline Prophet and Priest and King. newline Christ is coming newline Over the world victorious; newline Power and glory newline Unto the Lord belong.
